name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the evening of January 23, Hu Xijin posted a message calling on Sima Nan to sell his house in the United States and invest in A-shares, and work with him to safeguard the country's financial security.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Recently, a former police officer named Ma Meiliang from Huan County, Qingyang City, Gansu Province, publicly reported on social media under his real name that the local countyâ€™s discipline inspection committee secretary, supervisory committee members and others were suspected of abusing their power for personal gain and instructing the staff of the discipline inspection and supervisory committee to fabricate facts of bribery by false testimony in order to frame him.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 23, a woman from Pingdingshan, Henan said that she was harassed for two hours when she was withdrawing 5,000 yuan from the bank, and she was finally able to withdraw the money after calling the police.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 23, Hong Kong radical pro-establishment social activist and pro-China activist Chan Ching-sum said that she had had enough of the Lee Ka-chiu government. Police officers were ambushing at the entrance of public toilets in the middle of the night and issuing fines. Shop owners who left discarded paper boxes outside for elderly people to sell were also fined by the Food and Environmental Hygiene Department for littering. Even a broom shared by shops along the street was fined.
As of the time of posting, the Weibo post could no longer be found on Chan Ching-sum's homepage.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: January 23, Shanghai. Haiyin Wealth collapsed, and the repayment plan has not been implemented yet. Hundreds of investors came to the company to defend their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: At 15:24 on January 24, a fire broke out in the basement of a shop along Tiangong South Avenue in Jialeyuan, Yushui District, Xinyu, Jiangxi. As of 18:40, the accident had caused 25 deaths, and the remaining injured were being treated in the hospital.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The suicide of an 18-year-old boy in Guanyun County, Lianyungang has further fermented.
Since the 19th, the police have blocked the entrance to Zhang Xinwei's village and prevented people from visiting the deceased's family.
On January 24, thousands of people from the surrounding areas rushed to Zhangbaoshan Village to support Zhang Xinwei's father and seek justice for him. The crowds at the scene blocked the road.
Some people waved the national flag at the scene, and people shouted "Long live Chairman Mao".

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The death toll from the fire has risen to 39

content: On January 23, the Shanghai Greenland Shiwan project owed the owners rent for more than a year, and the owners gathered at No. 700 Dapu Road to defend their rights.
